attributes.action: Help fund our project to support Further Education for adults with Autism and Learning Difficulties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My wife and I havd formed the non profit making company The Helping Hands Group. The Helping Hands Group propose to deliver a Further Education Service in (Initially) Peterborough for adults (18+) with learning difficulties.
We are looking to raise around £180,000 which will secure the setting up costs and run the budget of the company for 1 year giving us the opportunity to be able to deliver the best possible service. The money will give us rented property, pay qualified staff, purchase consumables and activities and most importantly purchase the correct equipment.
Our aim is to start with around 6 Service Users with a long term goal of branching out and creating a Helping Hands Group day service to every major UK city.
